00001 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00002 #include "ParticleOctree.h"
00003 #include "ClothParticle.h"
00004 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 void  ParticleOctree::checkCollisionOnNode(TreeNode <ClothParticle> *node)
00009 {
00010     if(node->m_height !=1)
00011     {
00012         for(int i=0;i<8;++i)
00013         {
00014             checkCollisionOnNode(node->m_child[i]);
00015         }
00016     }
00017     else
00018     {
00019         if(node->m_objectList.size()<=1)
00020         {
00021             return;
00022         }
00023         ngl::Vec3 P, Q, Vp, N, force;
00024         float Rp, Rq, dist, speed;
00025         BOOST_FOREACH(ClothParticle *currentParticle,node->m_objectList)
00026         {
00027             P = currentParticle->getPosition();
00028             Vp = currentParticle->getVelocity();
00029             speed = Vp.length();
00030             Rp = 0.1;
00031             //currentParticle->getRadius();
00032             force.m_x = force.m_y = force.m_z = 0.0;
00033 
00034             BOOST_FOREACH(ClothParticle *testParticle,node->m_objectList )
00035             {
00036                 // no need to self test
00037                 if(testParticle==currentParticle)
00038                 {
00039                   // continue
00040                   continue;
00041                  }
00042                 Q = testParticle->getPosition();
00043                 Rq = 0.1;
00044                         //testParticle->getRadius();
00045                 dist = Rq + Rq - (P-Q).length();
00046                 if(dist > 0) // collision between P and Q
00047                 {
00048                     N = P-Q;
00049                     N.normalize();
00050                     force += dist*N;
00051                 }
00052             }
00053             Vp += force;
00054             Vp.normalize();
00055             currentParticle->setVelocity(force);
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }
